actions.text: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment to (1) require agencies to enhance competition in contracting; (2) limit the use of abuse-prone contracts; (3) rebuild the federal acquisition workforce; (4) strengthen anti-fraud measures; and (5) increase transparency in federal contracting.
purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 110-666 to (1) require agencies to enhance competition in contracting; (2) limit the use of abuse-prone contracts; (3) rebuild the federal acquisition workforce; (4) strengthen anti-fraud measures; and (5) increase transparency in federal contracting.
